creator: Darin_Swanson@us.ibm.com
text:
From the description of the signjar task:
"The 'signjar' attribute can point to the file to generate;"
should be
"The 'signedjar' attribute can point to the file to generate;"

As well:
"The tool detailed dependency checking: files are only signed if they are not 
signed."
should this read:
"The tool's detailed dependency checking: files are only signed if they are 
not signed."
?

creator: bodewig@apache.org
text:
signjar's manual page in CVS looks a lot better than the one that shipped with
1.6.5 and earlier versions.  See
http://cvs.apache.org/viewcvs.cgi/*checkout*/ant/docs/manual/CoreTasks/signjar.html
